EasyABM.jl

Abmot is an easy to use and performant agent-based modeling tool.

Package Features

API

EasyABM provides following functions for agent based simulations.

Functions related to graphs

EasyABM.adjacency_matrix — Function
adjacency_matrix(g::EasyABM.SimplePropGraph) -> SparseArrays.SparseMatrixCSC{Int64, Int64}

Returns Adjacency matrix as a Sparse Matrix for a given simple prop graph.

source
adjacency_matrix(g::EasyABM.DirPropGraph) -> SparseArrays.SparseMatrixCSC{Int64, Int64}

Returns Adjacency matrix as a Sparse Matrix for a given directed prop graph.
